Ekañjaliya Thera：1．Ekañjaliya Thera.-An arahant．Ninety-two kappas ago he provided a place of residence for the Buddha Tissa in an udumbara-grove and spread for him a carpet of flowers and paid homage to him with clasped hands．Once he was a king，called Ekañjalika．Ap.i.236.

2．Ekañjalika Thera.-An arahant．Ninety-four kappas ago he saw the Pacceka Buddha Romasa，on the banks of a river and，being pleased with his radiant appearance，paid homage to him with clasped hands．Ap.i.281.
